explanation: Global Witness is an international NGO that investigates the exploitation of natural resources and its impact on human rights and corruption. They campaign against unsustainable forest exploitation, corruption in the oil, gas, and mining industries, and the trade in conflict diamonds. They are clearly not a fossil fuel organisation, government department, or educational institution. [https://www.globalwitness.org/en/](https://www.globalwitness.org/en/) [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Global_Witness](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Global_Witness)

SOCAR is the State Oil Company of the Republic of Azerbaijan. The provided documents show that it is involved in the exploration, production, refining, and transportation of oil and gas. Therefore, it is a fossil fuel company. See: [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SOCAR](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SOCAR)
